attributes.action: Limit airtime for Nigel Farage.  He is an embarrassment to all Britons.
attributes.background: Nigel Farage seems to have more airspace than any other politician, yet  he does not have a seat in the British Parliament and his party only has 1 MP.  He is a rude and toxic individual and is not helpful to the Brexit resolution.  The exposure he is given disproportionately represents our country.
